title.text: L'IDEE DE GRA~E~IRE AVEC LE CONTEXTE NATUREL

entities.text: L'IDEE DE GRA~E~IRE AVEC LE CONTEXTE NATUREL

abstractContent.text: Commonly used gralm~mrs which describe i~turai lan~uages /ex.
ATN, Metamorphosis Grammars/ can be hardly applied in describing higly inflectional languages.
So I propose a grammar called the grammar with natural context which takes into consideration properties of higly inflectional languages /ex.
Polish / as well as structural languages /ex.
